item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:00, so let's meet right inside the ticket lobby at 6:30 on Tuesday. We're going to see EPL, after all, since it's still running.

Hope to see you Tuesday!

--Dana
508/308-4897



OLD STUFF:
It's a chick flick, yes. Let's all agree to that and move on. Julia Roberts has been doing a lot of junket work for this film and, honestly, I love her movies. So let's get our girl on and head to Eat Pray Love.

Backup plan: In case Eat Pray Love is out of the theaters by next Tuesday, we'll go see The American, which is not a chick flick, but which girls will enjoy anyway for the mere fact that George Clooney stars in it. Keep an eye on your email a few days before, when I'll update the time and which movie we will, in fact, see on Tuesday.

SUMMARY for EPL:
Liz Gilbert had everything a modern woman is supposed to dream of having -- a husband, a house, a successful career -- yet like so many others, she found herself lost, confused, and searching for what she really wanted in life. Newly divorced and at a crossroads, Gilbert steps out of her comfort zone, risking everything to change her life, embarking on a journey around the world that becomes a quest for self-discovery. In her travels, she discovers the true pleasure of nourishment by eating in Italy; the power of prayer in India, and, finally and unexpectedly, the inner peace and balance of true love in Bali.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Unos to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for Eat Pray Love!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: Eat Pray Love
